powersupply: Power       source: Rechargeable Li-Ion battery D-LI90, Recordable images:       Approx 800 Playback time: Approx. 440 minutes AC adapter       available: Yes (optional)
flash: Type:       N/A Guide number: N/A Coverage: N/A Flash modes: On, redeye,       slow sync, slow sync + redeye Flash exposure compensation: -2       to 1 EV in 1/3 steps

interfaces: Ports:       USB2.0 (Hi-Speed: mini B-type), Video output (mini phone type),       HDMI output (type C mini), DC input, Cable switch, X-sync       socket Printer interfaces: n/a
languagesupport: English,       French, German, Spanish, Portuguese, Italian, Dutch, Danish,       Swedish, Finnish, Polish, Czech, Hungarian, Turkish, Greek,       Russian, Korean, Traditional/Simplified Chinese, Japanese
lens: Type/construction:       PENTAX 645AF2 bayonet mount Usable lenses: PENTAX 645AF2,       645AF, and 645A mount lenses SDM function: Yes
meteringsystem: Type:       TTL open-aperture 77 segment metering Sensitivity range: EV 2       to 21 (ISO 200 w 55mm F2.8) Multi-segment: Yes, 77 segments       Center weighted: Yes Spot: Yes Exposure compensation: +/- 5 EV       (1/3 and 1/2 steps) Exposure lock: Yes Exposure bracketing:       Yes, 3 or 5 frames, up to +/- 2 EV (1/2 or 1/3 steps)
lcdmonitor: TFT       color LCD monitor, Wide angle view, Brightness adjustable,       Color adjustable, AR Coating, Reinforced glass Size:3.0 inch       Dots:approx. 921,000 dots
externalflash: Hot       shoe, X-sync socket, sync-speed: 1/125 sec., P-TTL,       high-speed-sync, wireless-sync with PENTAX dedicated external       flash
capturemodes: Mode       selection: Program (P), Sensitivity Priority (Sv), Shutter       Priority (Tv), Aperture Priority (Av), Shutter and Aperture       Priority (TAv), Metered Manual, Bulb, X-Speed Green simplified       mode available: No P/A/S/M/B: P, A, S, M, B (extended modes Sv,       TAv) Date stamp: n/a Digital filters (capture): Custom Image       Function includes Bright, Natural, Portrait, Landscape,       Vibrant, Muted modes, and Reversal Film each with gamut radar       and fine adjustment of saturation, hue, high/low key, contrast,       and sharpness (regular and fine adjustment scales). Monochrome       mode includes adjustment for filter effects (green, yellow,       orange, red, magenta, blue, cyan, infrared), toning (sepia       warm/cool), high/low key, contrast, and sharpness (regular and       fine adjustment scales). Data record: Folder name (standard,       date), file name (standard, customizable), embed copyright
sensor: TTL       phase-difference 11 point (9 cross) wide autofocus system (11       point SAFOX IX+) Focus modes: AF Single (w/ focus lock), AF       Continuous, Manual Focus point adjustment: Auto,       user-selectable, center
physicalspecs: Body       dimensions (W x H x D): 6.1 x 4.6 x 4.7” Body weight       Without battery or removable memory: 49.4 oz Loaded and ready:       52.2 oz Construction material(s): Magnesium alloy shell       over aluminum diecast chassis Operating temperature:       14-104°F (-10 to 40°C)
viewfinder: Type:       Trapezoid pentaprism Coverage (field of view): 98%       Magnification: 0.62X (w/ D FA645 55mmF2.8 at infinity) Standard       focusing screen: Natural-Bright-Matte Diopter adjustment: -3.5       to 2.0 Depth of field preview: Optical (diaphragm stop down),       Digital
whitebalance: Auto       preset modes: Auto, Daylight, Shade, Cloudy, Fluorescent (D, N,       W, L), Tungsten, Flash, CTE Manual mode(s): Yes, manual and 3       color temperature selections available * WB fine adjustment       available in all modes
